descriptionHtml:
#############################################
   - Better Marriable Women v1.0 by Despierto -
#############################################

This mod will change APPEARANCE of most of the marriable women in Skyrim, they will be more
beautiful and really \"mariable\". This is my first mod, I\'ll fix any bugs just let me know.



############
Installation
############
That\'s easy. Just copy all of the files to your Skyrim/Data directory.
And don\'t forget to activate mods with launcher, if necessary.


############
Including NPCS
############
*Aela the Huntress
*Anwen
*Avrusa Sarethi
*Borgakh
*Brelyna Maryon
*Camilla Valerius
*Gilfre
*Grelka
*Jenassa
*Iona
*Jordis
*Mjoll
*Muiri
*Njada Stonearm
*Ria
*Sylgja
*Uthgerd
*Ysolda

############
Recommended mods
############
If you want realistic view like me, you need to setup several mods.

XCE - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2356
Better Females - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
Skyrim ENB - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5587


############
Uninstallation
############
*Remove the files on this directory: \"Data/meshes/actors/characters/facegendata/facegeom\"
*Remove the <npcname>.esp files on Data folder.


############
Notes
############
*This mod will not change the faces of some women. Because I think they\'re not marriable at all.
*This is not a texture mode, so it will change only hairs, brows, eyes, face builds etc.


############
Credits
############
I used NPC Editor by foretrenty to make this mod.
author: Despierto
